short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides a button to show bookmark tree and open bookmark in new tab.
short.zh_CN: 提供一个可以显示书籤树, 并开启书籤的按钮.
short.zh_TW: 提供一個可以顯示書籤樹, 並開啟書籤的按鈕.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Provides a button to show bookmark tree and open bookmark in new tab.
Have options to add custom styles, modify click behaviors (for example, right click to open in new window instead of in new tab), set the root directory, etc.

This is the first extension I made.
I make this just because I don't like always show bookmark bar.

v0.14.2
Fix "Open in background tab" behavior.

v0.14.1
Remove tabs permission.

v0.14.0
Fix popup display issue.

Source code: https://github.com/ayamomiji/bookmark-tree
long.zh_CN:
提供一个可以显示书籤树, 并开启书籤的按钮.
可自订外观, 点击行为 (例如, 按右键开启于新视窗而不是新分页), 设定根目录等等.

v0.14.2
修復 "开启於背景新分页" 行为.

v0.14.1
移除 tabs 权限

v0.14.0
修复弹出视窗显示问题

原始码: https://github.com/ayamomiji/bookmark-tree
long.zh_TW:
提供一個可以顯示書籤樹, 並開啟書籤的按鈕.
可自訂外觀, 點擊行為 (例如, 按右鍵開啟於新視窗而不是新分頁), 設定根目錄等等.

v0.14.2
修復 "開啟於背景新分頁" 行為.

v0.14.1
移除 tabs 權限.

v0.14.0
修復彈出視窗顯示問題.

原始碼: https://github.com/ayamomiji/bookmark-tree
